price: 20. Eigenaar van macht en een hoge status bij de Heer van de troon.
arabic: ذِي قُوَّةٍ عِندَ ذِي ٱلۡعَرۡشِ مَكِينٖ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: dhī quwwatin ʿinda dhī al-ʿarshi makīnin
